sentences.en: Butter, margarine, and oily fish are all good sources of vitamin D.
sentences.cn: 黄油、人造黄油和多脂鱼都含有丰富的维生素D。

sentences.en: He was put on a high dosage of vitamin C.
sentences.cn: 给他服了大剂量的维生素C。

sentences.en: If you give your child a vitamin, perhaps you should stick with this classic.
sentences.cn: 如果你给你的孩子服用一种维他命，可能你需要坚持这一个原则。

sentences.en: It has also been fortified with vitamin C.
Large supplemental doses of vitamin E can slightly raise blood pressure.
sentences.cn: 大剂量补充维生素E可能会造成血压偏高。

sentences.en: Liver and kidney are particularly rich in vitamin A.
sentences.cn: 肝脏和肾脏富含维生素A。

sentences.en: Many people swear by vitamin C's ability to ward off colds.
sentences.cn: 许多人深信维生素C能预防感冒。

sentences.en: Milk, oily fish and egg all contain vitamin D.
sentences.cn: 牛奶、油性鱼类和鸡蛋都含有维生素D.

sentences.en: The odour of vitamin in skin is repugnant to insects.
sentences.cn: 昆虫很讨厌皮肤内维生素的气味。

sentences.en: They did blood tests on him for signs of vitamin deficiency.
sentences.cn: 他们给他验了血，以检查是否有维生素缺乏的迹象。

sentences.en: This special form of vitamin D is naturally present in breast milk.
sentences.cn: 这种特殊形态的维生素D天然存在于母乳中。

sentences.en: To make sure the children are well-nourished, vitamin drops are usually recommended.
sentences.cn: 为确保孩子充分摄取营养，通常推荐使用维生素滴剂。

sentences.en: Try to eat foods that are rich in vitamins and minerals.
sentences.cn: 尽量吃富含维生素和矿物质的食物。

sentences.en: Vitamin B assists in red-blood-cell regeneration.
sentences.cn: 维生素B可以促进红细胞再生。

sentences.en: Vitamin C increases the absorption of iron from food.
sentences.cn: 维生素C促进食物中铁的吸收。

sentences.en: You are asked to swallow a capsule containing vitamin B.
sentences.cn: 你要服一粒维生素B胶囊。

sentences.en: You can buy a formulation containing royal jelly, pollen and vitamin C.
sentences.cn: 可以买一种含蜂王浆、花粉和维生素C的配方产品。

phrases.tran_cn: 维生素D（抗佝偻病维生素）；钙化醇
维生素缺乏；维生素缺乏症
维生素E；生育酚；抗不育维生素

trans.tran_en: a chemical substance in food that is necessary for good health
